title: Empire Of Dreams: The Story Of The Star Wars 2004 DVDRip XviD
description:
The most complete documentary ever produced about the saga and never before seen footage of the three films. The story of the making of the trilogy is as epic and dramatic as the films themselves. The video shows since the early versions of the script to the blockbuster debut of the films that changed the face of cinema. In the most comprehensive documentary of all time on film production, explore the creation of this saga, including the difficulties that George Lucas and his team had to face to create the series few thought could be terminated. Three new featurettes explore in depth the unique contributions of movies from classic characters to the unforgettable lightsaber to the films' impact on a generation of filmmakers. This documentary features all-new interviews and rare footage of the making of an unprecedented all three films. Classic movie trailers, tv spots, demos, rare pictures mined the archives of Lucasfilm, and more make this video a record bonus absolutely complete.

Considered the most comprehensive documentary of all time on film production, contains material on:

Episode 4 - A New Hope (1977);

Episode 5 - The Empire Strikes Back (1980);
